TopicTitle: The Moon has a breathable atmosphere apparently...

Articles.Content:
So, my KSP loading screen came up just a little bit different today... I was cracking up

What the Kell? Anyone know how I can debug this "bug"?

Edit: NVM, it's an easter egg

How the...what the...where the...

Edited September 19, 2014 by sagirfahmid3

Yep .... it is when you work with the mod "Environmental Visual Enhancements" (which, among othr things, removes helmets in breathable atmosphere).

This "bug" has been around for some time .... guess someone forget to define Muns atmosphere in the loading screen as "vacuum" or "unbreathable"

This was an easter egg that only shows up on modded games, I think it was some toolbar plugin.

I am so tired of hearing about this.... there are at least a dozen threads about this
Yes, if you use kethane, kerbin changes so it look mapped. This is obiously splash screen as it show mapped even if you have not mapped it.
OOhh ok lol. I guess I will delete this thread. Or a moderator if I can't XD
Yes, it's an easter egg nested inside a mod. And thread closed by OP's request.
